oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Precedence constrained scheduling in (2-7/3p+1) . optimal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GANGAL, D
RANADE, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: processors
precedence constrained scheduling
approximation algorithm
deadline
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a polynomial time approximation algorithm for unit time precedence constrained scheduling. Our algorithm guarantees schedules which are at most (2 - 7/3p +1) factor as long as the optimal, where p > 3 is the number of processors. This improves upon a long standing bound of (2 - 2/p) due to Coffman and Graham. (C) 2008
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF COMPUTER AND SYSTEM SCIENCES, 74(7), 1139-1146
